Name: Duck Souls
About the game: Duck Souls is a fast-paced, action platformer about a little duck with an incredible skill to dash and a mission: find all the lost eggs in order to save his species. Duck Souls is set in cute and deadly fantasy world, where many hazards will try to cut your wings off your body while you struggle to find all lost eggs, and keep your species alive. Run, jump and dash through a colorful and treacherous environment to save everyone and become a hero. 100 levels - Play 100 lovely hand-crafted levels filled with deadly traps and random cult references! Tight controls - Jump over spikes, climb walls and avoid death with ease, optmized controls for gamepads and keyboards! Hardcore difficulty - There's no fighting in Duck Souls, so you'll have to rely on your speed, reflexes, and dashes to survive! Deadly traps - There are 20 types of traps ready to cut you in half, keep running and dashing! Cool soundtrack - Your thumbs may hate you, but your ears will love you! Hats - There are 20 different hats for you to collect and custumize your Duck! Take this... The golden cherry!
